title: Olhos da Lei
overview: For the first time, a television crew is authorized to record inside the SÃ£o Paulo Military Police Operations Center (COPOM). COPOM is the largest police operations center in the southern hemisphere. With technology, intelligence and images from body cameras, a troop of 1200 agents responds to 30,000 requests for help that arrive daily via 190. All under the Eye of the Law.
